Label: TNR_Painky04_3
String:
How cool! It's a hologram in full 2D!
It's so flat, it's like she's actually
standing here!
Translation:
How cool! It's a hologram in full 2D!
It's so flat, it's like she's actually
standing here!

Label: TNG_MR_Dance_Kinopio01
String:
That's right! Now that all the Big
Paint Stars are back, it's finally time
to fight Bowser!  OK, let's celebrate the return of ALL
the Big Paint Stars...  
 GET WILD!
Translation:
That's right! Now that all the Big
Paint Stars are back, it's finally time
to fight Bowser!  OK, let's celebrate the return of ALL
the Big Paint Stars...  
 GET WILD!

Label: TNR_MR_Dance_Disco01
String:   }♪Paint the Dance Floor♪ d
Translation:   }♪Paint the Dance Floor♪ d

Label: TNR_RStar15
String:
Yes, we have been scattered far
and wide, preventing us from
supplying the fountain—and our
world—with life-giving paint.  But there is hope! Mario, Huey...if
you can find the remaining five
Big Paint Stars, the fountain can
be restored.  Good luck, and let the paint be
your guide.
Translation:
Yes, we have been scattered far
and wide, preventing us from
supplying the fountain—and our
world—with life-giving paint.  But there is hope! Mario, Huey...if
you can find the remaining five
Big Paint Stars, the fountain can
be restored.  Good luck, and let the paint be
your guide.

Label: TNR_Painky02_2
String:
No...Ǵthat's not possible. Maybe it's
more like...Ǵwe can somehow hear
its voice inside our minds?
Translation:
No...Ǵthat's not possible. Maybe it's
more like...Ǵwe can somehow hear
its voice inside our minds?

Label: TNO_MR_Dance_Kinopio01
String:
Just one Big Paint Star left!
OK, let's celebrate the return of the
orange Big Paint Star...  
 Everybody, get on down!
Translation:
Just one Big Paint Star left!
OK, let's celebrate the return of the
orange Big Paint Star...  
 Everybody, get on down!

Label: TNB_MR_After_Painky01
String:
So that's what happened!  Bowser's army invaded with a ton
of airships and hauled off all of the
paint!  The one we destroyed at the 
Crimson Tower was just one of
them...  But what are they doing with all of
that paint?  Guess we'll have to rescue the next
Big Paint Star to find out!
Translation:
So that's what happened!  Bowser's army invaded with a ton
of airships and hauled off all of the
paint!  The one we destroyed at the 
Crimson Tower was just one of
them...  But what are they doing with all of
that paint?  Guess we'll have to rescue the next
Big Paint Star to find out!

Label: TNV_MR_Bfore_Painky01
String:
Woop woop! The purple Big Paint
Star is back in Port Prisma!
Translation:
Woop woop! The purple Big Paint
Star is back in Port Prisma!

Label: TNB_BStar01
String:
Thank you...
I am the blue Big Paint Star.  Allow me to share my memories with
you...
Translation:
Thank you...
I am the blue Big Paint Star.  Allow me to share my memories with
you...

Label: TNR_Painky01
String:
Finally! The red Big Paint Star is
back in its rightful place.  It's all thanks to you, Mario! I don't
know what we'd do without you.
Translation:
Finally! The red Big Paint Star is
back in its rightful place.  It's all thanks to you, Mario! I don't
know what we'd do without you.

Label: TNR_Painky02
String:
Wait...did the Paint Star just SAY
something? That's never happened
before.
Translation:
Wait...did the Paint Star just SAY
something? That's never happened
before.

Label: TNR_Painky03
String:
Whoa! Looks like Red just powered
you up, Mario!
Translation:
Whoa! Looks like Red just powered
you up, Mario!

Label: TNB_MR_Dance_Kinopio01
String:
I know we're all still tired from the
last celebration, but we need to
show the blue Big Paint Star how
much we care...  
 LET'S DANCE!
Translation:
I know we're all still tired from the
last celebration, but we need to
show the blue Big Paint Star how
much we care...  
 LET'S DANCE!

Label: TNR_Painky04
String:
Hold on, Mario! We need a plan.
We don't even know where that
airship is going yet!  Plus, I mean...did you get a good
look at that bad guy? He flung those
Paint Stars like they were nothing!
Translation:
Hold on, Mario! We need a plan.
We don't even know where that
airship is going yet!  Plus, I mean...did you get a good
look at that bad guy? He flung those
Paint Stars like they were nothing!

Label: TNR_MR_Dance_Samba01
String:   }♪Prism Samba♪ d
Translation:   }♪Prism Samba♪ d

Label: TNR_Painky06
String:
We're on it, Red!  Prisma Fountain must be restored!
Everyone should be able to see the
joy and beauty it brings to our town.
Translation:
We're on it, Red!  Prisma Fountain must be restored!
Everyone should be able to see the
joy and beauty it brings to our town.

Label: TNR_Kinopio01
String:
Mario! Princess Peach has been
kidnapped by Bowser! No one could
have predicted this!
Translation:
Mario! Princess Peach has been
kidnapped by Bowser! No one could
have predicted this!

Label: TNV_MR_After_Painky01
String:
Those Slurp Guys sucked the paint
out of everything in Port Prisma!  But why are they so paint crazy?!
They didn't just slurp walls and the
ground—they slurped Toads!  What is Bowser planning?
Translation:
Those Slurp Guys sucked the paint
out of everything in Port Prisma!  But why are they so paint crazy?!
They didn't just slurp walls and the
ground—they slurped Toads!  What is Bowser planning?

Label: TNR_MR_Dance_Kinopio01
String:
Guys, we got one of the Big Paint
Stars back—we need to celebrate!
Are you thinking what I'm thinking?   Dance party!
Translation:
Guys, we got one of the Big Paint
Stars back—we need to celebrate!
Are you thinking what I'm thinking?   Dance party!

Label: TNR_MR_Dance_Cossack01
String:   }♪Prismatic Rhapsody♪ d
Translation:   }♪Prismatic Rhapsody♪ d

Label: TNG_GStar01
String:
Mario, Huey...
You've both done splendidly.  I'm the green Big Paint Star.  My account of these unfortunate
events should make everything clear.  You're probably still wondering why
the fountain's paint turned black.  The truth is...
Translation:
Mario, Huey...
You've both done splendidly.  I'm the green Big Paint Star.  My account of these unfortunate
events should make everything clear.  You're probably still wondering why
the fountain's paint turned black.  The truth is...

Label: TNR_MR_Dance_Bollywood01
String:   }♪Prisma Prance Trance!♪ d
Translation:   }♪Prisma Prance Trance!♪ d

Label: TNR_RStar01
String: Thank you...Ǵboth.
Translation: Thank you...Ǵboth.

Label: TNR_RStar02
String:
That is correct, Huey. I am using
the power of paint to color your
thoughts.  Thank you both for saving me, but
there's work yet to do.  As you can see, the other
Big Paint Stars are still missing.  If it will help, I can share my memory
of what happened here with you.  But be warned...it is not pleasant.
Please, close your eyes...
Translation:
That is correct, Huey. I am using
the power of paint to color your
thoughts.  Thank you both for saving me, but
there's work yet to do.  As you can see, the other
Big Paint Stars are still missing.  If it will help, I can share my memory
of what happened here with you.  But be warned...it is not pleasant.
Please, close your eyes...

Label: TNR_Kinopio01_2
String:
I know this is highly unusual, but
can you help rescue her?
Translation:
I know this is highly unusual, but
can you help rescue her?

Label: TNO_OStar01
String:
I am the orange Big Paint Star.  I remember what happened just
before Bowser's army attacked Port
Prisma.  Let me show you...what happened
to Bowser. I warn you: it's not for the
faint of heart.
Translation:
I am the orange Big Paint Star.  I remember what happened just
before Bowser's army attacked Port
Prisma.  Let me show you...what happened
to Bowser. I warn you: it's not for the
faint of heart.

Label: TNR_Kinopio01_3
String: Whoa! What's that?
Translation: Whoa! What's that?

Label: TNR_Kinopio01_4
String:
This...is a Holo-Peach!  You know...a self-delivering
postcard shaped like Princess
Peach. ʼObviously.  She must have been able to get
one quick message out just as
she was being kidnapped.
Translation:
This...is a Holo-Peach!  You know...a self-delivering
postcard shaped like Princess
Peach. ʼObviously.  She must have been able to get
one quick message out just as
she was being kidnapped.

Label: TNR_Kinopio01_5
String:
Well, at least we know she's OK.
For now.
Translation:
Well, at least we know she's OK.
For now.

Label: TNR_Painky03_2
String:
Of course, what we could really
use is a detailed map, showing us
EXACTLY where that monster
threw our Paint Stars...  But this will have to do for now.
I just hope we have enough power
to defeat that...ɘthing!
Translation:
Of course, what we could really
use is a detailed map, showing us
EXACTLY where that monster
threw our Paint Stars...  But this will have to do for now.
I just hope we have enough power
to defeat that...ɘthing!

String:   }♪This Here's Paint Country! }♪ } d
Translation:   }♪This Here's Paint Country! }♪ } d

It all makes sense now!  If you mix all six of the fountain's
paint colors, the paint turns black!  Bowser was just having fun mixing all
the paint together! He didn't have
an evil plan after all!  You're telling me we could have
avoided this entire game if we just
installed a

It all makes sense now!  If you mix all six of the fountain's

an evil plan after all!  You're telling me we could have
avoided this entire game if we just

Label: TNV_MR_Dance_Kinopio01
String:
OK! How about we blow off 
some steam, eh? To celebrate
the revival of the purple Big 
Paint Star...  
 Let's shake it!
Translation:
OK! How about we blow off 
some steam, eh? To celebrate
the revival of the purple Big 
Paint Star...  
 Let's shake it!

Label: TNR_MR_After_Painky01
String:
Oh, that was awful! I've never seen
such wanton disregard for paint!  At least we got to see what
happened to the other Paint Stars.  That horrible monster just flung
them to the corners of the island
without a second thought!
Translation:
Oh, that was awful! I've never seen
such wanton disregard for paint!  At least we got to see what
happened to the other Paint Stars.  That horrible monster just flung
them to the corners of the island
without a second thought!

Label: TNO_MR_After_Painky01
String:
No way!  Bowser got covered in black paint
right here in Prisma Fountain!  But...why was there black paint in
Prisma Fountain in the first place?!  No matter the reason, the black
paint came from this very fountain!  We need to find the last Big Paint
Star ASAP!
Translation:
No way!  Bowser got covered in black paint
right here in Prisma Fountain!  But...why was there black paint in
Prisma Fountain in the first place?!  No matter the reason, the black
paint came from this very fountain!  We need to find the last Big Paint
Star ASAP!

String:   }♪Color Waltz♪ d
Translation:   }♪Color Waltz♪ d

Label: TNG_MR_Bfore_Painky01
String:
Hmm... I couldn't quite tell which
colorless location the green
Big Paint Star restored just now.  But now all the Big Paint Stars
are back at Prisma Fountain!
Translation:
Hmm... I couldn't quite tell which
colorless location the green
Big Paint Star restored just now.  But now all the Big Paint Stars
are back at Prisma Fountain!

Label: TNY_MR_Bfore_Painky01
String:
We did it! The yellow Big Paint Star
has been returned to Prisma
Fountain!
Translation:
We did it! The yellow Big Paint Star
has been returned to Prisma
Fountain!

Label: TNY_MR_Dance_Kinopio01
String:
All right! Without further ado,
let's celebrate the return of the
yellow Big Paint Star!  
 Everyone, get crazy!
Translation:
All right! Without further ado,
let's celebrate the return of the
yellow Big Paint Star!  
 Everyone, get crazy!

Label: TNO_MR_Bfore_Painky01
String:
Huzzah! The orange Big Paint Star
is back!
Translation:
Huzzah! The orange Big Paint Star
is back!

Label: TNR_Koopa01
String:
  BWAHAHA!
Feast your eyes!
Translation:
  BWAHAHA!
Feast your eyes!

Label: TNR_Koopa02
String:
   I have harnessed the power of
the black paint! Nothing can
stop me now!  Soon I will share the dark gift of
black paint with the entire world!  GWAHAHA!
Later, chumps!
Translation:
   I have harnessed the power of
the black paint! Nothing can
stop me now!  Soon I will share the dark gift of
black paint with the entire world!  GWAHAHA!
Later, chumps!

Label: TNY_YStar01
String:
Mario...and you too, Huey...  Thanks for saving me.
I am the yellow Big Paint Star.  My memory is a little better than
the red Big Paint Star's. Allow me to
get you up to speed.  Before Bowser scattered us
across the land, his underlings
showed up...
Translation:
Mario...and you too, Huey...  Thanks for saving me.
I am the yellow Big Paint Star.  My memory is a little better than
the red Big Paint Star's. Allow me to
get you up to speed.  Before Bowser scattered us
across the land, his underlings
showed up...

Label: TNY_MR_After_Painky01
String:
No way!  So it was Bowser's underlings who
drained that Toad of color and 
mailed him to you guys!  They must have sent that letter to
lure you to Port Prisma so they could
kidnap Princess Peach!  OK, if we can just keep finding
Big Paint Stars and piecing these
memories together, Bowser's evil
plan should become clear!
Translation:
No way!  So it was Bowser's underlings who
drained that Toad of color and 
mailed him to you guys!  They must have sent that letter to
lure you to Port Prisma so they could
kidnap Princess Peach!  OK, if we can just keep finding
Big Paint Stars and piecing these
memories together, Bowser's evil
plan should become clear!

Label: TNB_MR_Bfore_Painky01
String:
The blue Big Paint Star has returned
to Prisma Fountain!
Translation:
The blue Big Paint Star has returned
to Prisma Fountain!

Label: TNR_Painky04_2
String:
I've got an idea. Remember how the
red Big Paint Star said to let the
paint be our guide?  Well, I bet if we can recover all of
the Big Paint Stars, they'll point the
way to Princess Peach.  I know it's kinda crazy, but it's all
we've got. Come on, Mario. We've
got a lot of work to do!
Translation:
I've got an idea. Remember how the
red Big Paint Star said to let the
paint be our guide?  Well, I bet if we can recover all of
the Big Paint Stars, they'll point the
way to Princess Peach.  I know it's kinda crazy, but it's all
we've got. Come on, Mario. We've
got a lot of work to do!

Label: TNV_VStar01
String:
I am the purple Big Paint Star.
Mario, Huey, thank you for
saving me.  I remember the attack on
Port Prisma very clearly...
Translation:
I am the purple Big Paint Star.
Mario, Huey, thank you for
saving me.  I remember the attack on
Port Prisma very clearly...
